name: Efficient Focus Shift
text: You are more adept than most at shifting mental focus between your implements.
benefit: Twice per day when you shift mental focus from one implement to another, you can add the same number of points to the latter implement that you removed from the former.
normal: By removing points of mental focus from one implement, you can add the same amount – 1 to another.
special: You can take this feat multiple times. Its effects stack.
text_zh: 你比大多数人擅长转移灵器中的心智点。
benefit_zh: 每日两次，当你从一个灵器（Implements）向另一个转移心智点（Mental Focus）时，能够将与前者移除的数量相同的心智点转移至后者。
normal_zh: 当你将一个灵器的心智点转移至另一个灵器时，仅能将相同数值-1个心智点转移过去。
special_zh: 你可以多次选取该专长。专长效果会叠加。
